name: DHL Box Stacker Pro
description:
Beat the best in DHL Box Stacker Pro.

In this single player VR experience, you are tasked with stacking boxes correctly on the shelving as you ascend at an ever-increasing pace. Start at the floor and work your way up! A single challenge that's easy to start but increasingly difficult to master.

📦 Stack boxes as fast as possible to rise above the competition
⏱️ Quick game sessions
🔥 Intense gameplay
🏆 Global leaderboards
❓ How high can you try?
